0.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize count()
0.title: Finished Deployments

1.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize count() , by:{task.outcome}
1.title: Deployments status

10.content:
### Deployment Approvals Monitoring

This section highlights key metrics and trends related to deployment approvals, offering visibility into approval durations, approver activity, and bottlenecks that may impact release velocity.

---

11.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "azure.devops"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished" and task.outcome != "notDeployed"| fieldsRename  deployment.id = task.id
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| join [fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type=="approval" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished" | fields duration,task.outcome, approval.type, deployment.id, release.id, ext.project.id],kind: leftOuter,on:{deployment.id, release.id, ext.project.id},prefix:"approved."
| fields
Environment = upper(deployment.environment.name),
Status = task.outcome,
Duration=duration,
QueuedTime = task.queued.duration,
WaitingForApproval = if( isNotNull(approved.duration),approved.duration,else: "n/a"),
ApprovalType = approved.approval.type,
Finished = end_time,
ReleaseName = release.name,
Attempt = deployment.attempt,
PipelineId = cicd.pipeline.id,
PipelineName= cicd.pipeline.name,
ReleaseUrl = release.url.full,
Project = ext.project.name,
TriggerReason = ext.deployment.trigger.reason
| sort Finished desc
| limit 20
11.title: Deployments | last 20

12.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "azure.devops"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize p50 = median(duration), by: {upper(deployment.environment.name), ext.project.name}
| sort p50 desc | limit 5
12.title: Deployments duration ( p50 ) | Top 5

13.query:
fetch events | filter event.type == "approval" and event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| fieldsAdd sortTime = if(isNotNull(end_time),end_time,else:start_time)
| dedup release.id, deployment.id , ext.project.id, approval.id, sort:{sortTime desc}
| filter event.status == "started"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize count()
13.title: Pending Approvals

14.query:
fetch events | filter  event.type == "approval" and event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize count(), by:{task.outcome}
14.title: Finished Approvals Status

15.query:
fetch events | filter  event.type == "approval" and event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize p50 = median(duration), by:{ext.project.name, deployment.environment.name}
| sort p50 desc
| limit 5
15.title: Median Approvals Duration by Project and Environment | Top 5

16.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize failureRate = if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(task.outcome=="failure")) / toDouble(count())*100)
16.title: Failure Rate

17.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" and event.type == "deployment"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| makeTimeseries p50 = median(duration),p90 = percentile(duration,90),time: end_time,  by: {deployment.environment.name}
17.title: Deployments duration

18.query:
fetch events | filter event.type == "approval" and event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize p50 = median(duration)
18.title: Approvals Duration | p50

19.query:
fetch events | filter event.type == "approval" and event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize p90 = percentile(duration,90)
19.title: Approvals Duration | p90

2.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize Count = count() , by:{upper(deployment.environment.name)}
| sort Count desc
2.title: Finished Deployments by Environment

20.query:
fetch events | filter event.type == "approval" and event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| fieldsAdd sortTime = if(isNotNull(end_time),end_time,else:start_time)
| dedup release.id, deployment.id , ext.project.id, approval.id, sort:{sortTime desc}
| filter event.status == "started"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| fieldsAdd waitingTime = toTimestamp(now()) - toTimestamp(start_time)
| summarize max(waitingTime)
20.title: Max waiting time -  pending approval

21.content:
### Azure DevOps Release and Deployment Pulse
#### for Classic Release Pipelines

This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of deployment and release activities within Azure DevOps pipelines, enabling engineering and DevOps teams to monitor, analyze, and optimize their software delivery processes. 

---

22.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished" and deployment.attempt > 1
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize count()
22.title: Re-Deployments

23.query:
fetch events | filter  event.type == "approval" and event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize p50 = median(duration), by:{approval.type}
| sort p50 desc
| limit 5
23.title: Median Approvals Duration by Type

24.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "azure.devops"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize p50 = median(task.queued.duration), by: {upper(deployment.environment.name)}
| sort p50 desc | limit 5
24.title: Deployments wait to start ( p50 )

25.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "azure.devops"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize p50 = median(task.queued.duration)
25.title: Deployments wait to start ( p50 )

26.content:
#### Share feedback 
We welcome your feedback on this dashboard to help us improve and deliver a more effective observability solution, ensuring it provides maximum value to your software development lifecycle and delivery processes. Please post a comment here: [Feedback channel for CI/CD Pipeline Observability](https://community.dynatrace.com/t5/Platform-Engineering/Feedback-channel-for-CI-CD-Pipeline-Observability/m-p/269193/highlight/true#M1) (Dynatrace Community).
#
---

#### Additional resources
**Pipeline Observability**
* [Observability throughout the software development lifecycle increases delivery performance](https://www.dynatrace.com/news/blog/observability-throughout-the-software-development-lifecycle/) (Blog Post)
* [Concepts](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/pipeline-observability-concepts) (Docs)

**Software Development Lifecycle Events**
* [Ingest SDLC events](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/sdlc-events) (Docs)
* [SDLC event specification]() (Docs)
#
---

#### About this dashboard

Preview Release v0.1.0, [Origin](https://github.com/Dynatrace/dynatrace-configuration-as-code-samples)

3.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| makeTimeseries Count = count() , by:{upper(deployment.environment.name)}
3.title: Deployments Frequency

4.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "azure.devops"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" and  event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize p50 = median(duration), p90 = percentile(duration,90)
4.title: Deployments duration | p50

5.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "azure.devops"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" and  event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize p50 = median(duration), p90 = percentile(duration,90)
5.title: Deployments duration | p90

6.query:
fetch events | filter  event.type == "approval" and event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize count()
6.title: Finished Approvals

7.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize Count = count() , by:{ext.project.name}
| sort Count desc
7.title: Deployments by Project

8.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished" and task.outcome == "failure"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize Count = count() , by:{ upper(deployment.environment.name),ext.project.name}
| sort Count desc | limit 5
8.title: Error prune deployments | top 5

9.query:
fetch events | filter  event.type == "approval" and event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| fieldsAdd sortTime = if(isNotNull(end_time),end_time,else:start_time)
| dedup release.id, deployment.id , ext.project.id, task.id, sort:{sortTime desc}
| filter event.status == "started"
| filter in(ext.project.name, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| fields
Release = release.name,
Project = ext.project.name,
Environment = deployment.environment.name,
ReleasePipeline = cicd.pipeline.name,
ApprovalType = approval.type,
Start = start_time,
Waiting = toTimestamp(now()) - toTimestamp(start_time),
ReleaseUrl = release.url.full
9.title: Pending Approvals

variables.input:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize projects = collectDistinct(ext.project.name)
| expand projects
| sort projects

fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize env = collectDistinct(deployment.environment.name)
| expand env
| sort env

fetch events | filter event.provider == "azure.devops" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize pipeline = collectDistinct(cicd.pipeline.name)
| expand pipeline
| sort pipeline
